message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible for you to consider $120 for the item?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $150 is already a very competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to keep my spending within my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $125 for the item?
